children.text: The stormwater drain in this area has not been installed deep enough to prevent it from damage.
Part 3.1.2.5 Stormwater Drainage of the BCA states that
‘Cover to 90mm Class 6 UPVC stormwater drains be not less than 100mm under soil; 50mm under paved areas’ .
The builder will therefore have to lower this drain to protect it from damage in accordance with the above.
